tool.name: Create protein table
tool.command:
echo Protein accession > proteintable.txt && tail -n+2 '$psmtable'|cut -f $accessioncol |grep -v '\;'|grep -v "^$"|sort|uniq >> proteintable.txt #if $isoquant.yesno.value == "true" && msspsmtable isoratio -i '$psmtable' -o isoquant.txt --protcol $accessioncol --targettable proteintable.txt --isobquantcolpattern '$isoquant.isobpattern' --denompatterns '$isoquant.denompatterns' --minint $isoquant.minint #if $isoquant.normalize.type != "false" --normalize median #if $isoquant.normalize.type == "medianother" --norm-ratios '$isoquant.normalize.norm_ratio_table' #end if #end if && mv isoquant.txt proteintable.txt #end if
#if $ms1quant && mssprottable ms1quant -i proteintable.txt -o ms1quanted.txt --psmtable '$psmtable' --protcol '$accessioncol' && mv ms1quanted.txt proteintable.txt #end if
&& mv proteintable.txt '$output'

param.name: psmtable
param.label: PSM table
param.help: Must contain isobaric ratios and accession of protein/gene/peptide

param.name: accessioncol
param.label: Accession column number in PSM table containing the proteins, genes, peptides to quantify

param.name: yesno
param.label: Use isobaric data to output ratios?

param.name: isobpattern
param.label: Pattern for isobaric quant columns in PSM table
param.help: Regex to find quant columns, e.g. tmt10plex, itraq8plex, plex

param.name: denompatterns
param.label: Patterns for denominator isobaric quant columns in PSM table
param.help: Multiple are separated with space, e.g. _126 _127N

param.name: minint
param.label: Minimum intensity of PSM channel to include

param.name: type
param.label: Normalize isobaric ratios?
param.option: Median center using ratios from other table

param.name: norm_ratio_table
param.label: Tabular datatable with ratios
param.help: Same isobaric quant columns should occur

param.name: ms1quant
param.label: Calculate MS1 quant?
param.help: Average of 3 highest PSM MS1 areas for a protein

tool.help: Creates a protein table from PSM and peptide tables. Choose for each entry to add isobaric quant, precursor quant, probabilities.
